title: Floating Point Optimization
body:
by **Popog42**: 
gc generates assembly with FMULD when FCHS would be more efficient.

I cannot seem to get it to use FCHS in any situation.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
darwin 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
18926649cda7+ release/release.2010-08-25
